name: decom_toggle_cursor_home_with_region
description: DECOM toggles home cursor to absolute origin vs scroll-region origin when DECSTBM is active
comment: DECSTBM(2,4) -> region rows 1..3. DECOM on homes cursor to (1,0). CUP(4,5) under DECOM clamps to region bottom at row 3. DECOM off homes to (0,0), print X. DECOM on homes to (1,0), print Y.
